thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com
thread.title: Tiffany H.
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Tiffany H.

author: Tiffany H.
title: Tiffany H.
text: I was excited to try frames direct. I received various emails letting me know about my order and status which is very helpful as I waited for my package. Unfortunately I ordered too small a size frame and had to return them. Frames Direct was very helpful and responsive right away to make sure my experience was a good one. Because they go above and beyond to make sure I had a good experience I will definitely use them again. SUPER responsive to customers.
